content.text: This record is used to document Eventus Law Limited’s understanding of the origin and pathway of the specific funds involved in a matter, where Source of Funds enquiries have been identified as necessary following completion of the Client and Matter Level Risk Assessment (CMLRA).
This record is supplementary to the CMLRA and does not repeat information already obtained there.
Any requirement for supporting documentation, enhanced due diligence, or escalation will be determined separately by the Eventus AML Compliance Assistant, applying a risk-based approach.
